name: tinselly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to or made of tinsel (= long pieces of thin, shiny material used for decoration): The costumes included at least one tinselly gold wig. I kept thinking wistfully about my tinselly decorations, gathering dust in the attic.
exciting and attractive, but of low quality or value: a glitzy, tinselly ballad full of powerful singing He was a sensible man who mistrusted the more tinselly aspects of theatre and film. See
tinsel
More examplesFewer examplesYou are confronted with kitsch: reindeer horns and scratchy, tinselly trees.How ghastly they look in their tinselly dresses.They have auditioned for the tinselly school musical.
